website_summaries.verdict: A top-selling mascara by a premium brand that's known for its quality natural ingredients. Lengthens and darkens lashes and holds up well to moisture exposure.
pros: Natural formula doesn't contain synthetic ingredients
Defines lashes and makes them look darker and longer
cons: Doesn't add a lot of volume
A lot of product comes out when you remove the wand, which could result in waste

customer_reviews.title: Tube not full, consistency thin.
customer_reviews.text: I love tarts, specifically this mascara. But this is nothing like the tubes I’ve bought at Sephora. It was noticeably light in my hand and only had about half an inch of mascara in the tube. It’s also thin in consistency compared to my other tube from Sephora. I’m very disappointed. I was expecting the quality to be the same as from a store, since I appeared to be buying from Tarte.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Drea

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It isn't clumpy and it stays on ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mascara for a few years now. I love it! It isn't clumpy and it stays on all day. Sometimes I will do a second application before I go to a happy hour or dinner after work, but that's to make my eyelashes taller. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Gierhart

customer_reviews.title: Flakey
customer_reviews.text: I tried twice to make this mascara work and it just did NOT happen. No matter what I did it clumbed and by lunch time I looked like a raccoon. Once I found one that did not smudge I threw this in the TRASH where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: E. Threatt

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof mascara I've used
customer_reviews.text: I wear this for teaching sweaty workout classes, including in a humid pool area, and it does not run. No racoon eyes. Removes easily with soap, makeup remover, or cold cream, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy VandeKerckhove

customer_reviews.title: Go with the non-water proof
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the non-waterproof version. This one seems to be much more clumpy and goopy. I would give the non-water proof version 5 stars; it doesn't run or smear, and can even handle a little water.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Yassss!
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended this mascara after I told her how my current mascara would leave smudges on my eyelids throughout the day, which I hated. With this mascara that does not happen. I am very happy with the product so far. It is not easy to take off with baby wipes, my friend told me to get a makeup remover and it will come right off.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Laurenti

customer_reviews.title: I wish someone would come out with brown, not ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish someone would come out with brown, not black/brown, not black. More realistic. And take out the little fuzzy things. At least for older women who just want to have eyelashes, and have them look natural.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Ran like mad after quick shower
customer_reviews.text: Not actually waterproof. 🤷‍♀️ Runs when wet...after a quick shower, it was running like mad...not sure there was much left on my lashes. And, somewhat clumpy when dry.
customer_reviews.author: BennettMomma5

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, not waterproof at all and very little mascara in the product and very dry formula. Not worth buying this here (better in store).
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Medina

customer_reviews.title: ... Literally hours! Saved in make up time.
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin short lashes and have tried every Mascara from drugstore brands to high end brands that I cannot afford. I have to wear waterproof mascara and when I gave this mascara a try, it went on so smoothly and lengthened my lashes without any clumps. It has Saved me hours of make up time ... Literally hours!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara - 4 stars only because it's a bit pricey in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Good mascara - it does smudge when I wear concealer and can get just a little clumpy but overall, I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't irritate my eyes
customer_reviews.text: The best mascara l have ever used in my entire life and lm 61 years old. It stays on for days and it doesn't itch my eyes and it done run. I will be ordering again and again thanks....
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I heard from a friend that this mascara was the best. So I tried it, and did not notice any different. Had to go back to my old mascara and put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Pouchot

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre mascara
customer_reviews.text: It seems like the formula has changed. I have been using this mascara for years with great results. This time, however the mascara did not make my lashes look as long and full and was very difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara... My lashes are curly but this makes them straight and very long...
customer_reviews.author: Katt Miller

customer_reviews.title: No thank you
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it at all. Waste of money for sure. I’m a makeup lover and this did nothing for my lashes. I like tarte for everything but mascara.
customer_reviews.author: susu f

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Just OK. Used to be better. I think they changed the formula!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: ... something more natural but this is no where as good as my $9 cover girl
customer_reviews.text: i wanted something more natural but this is no where as good as my $9 cover girl. I was sad it was smeared under my eyes after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: -LifeOfSomeKind

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Love it but it’s NOT waterproof like it said when I ordered it. I love the way my lashes look but I could of saved $5 by ordering the same product not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: The best mascara! the only brand that does not breakdown by end of day
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Lennon

customer_reviews.title: Best All Natural Waterproof Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Favorite waterproof black mascara! All natural ingredients (my top priority), no smudges throughout the day and truly waterproof! Have worn throughout the summer and in a pool with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Rix

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mascara from Tarte
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mascara from Tarte! It separates my lashes and makes them appear longer and thicker without clumping. Applying two to three thin layers and letting each layer dry for about 15 seconds makes each application go on smoothly. It stands up to daily wear and water. I am mid 40's and lucky to have lashes that have not yet thinned but I'm too lazy to reapply make up throughout the day. This product lasts all day. I started using it with Tarte's lash extending fibers and it works great for me. I have sensitive eyes and have not had any irritation from this product. (or any other Tarte product I use) Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Spraydemon

customer_reviews.title: Too sticky
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it. It makes my lashes stick together and is very clumpy. I wish I hadn't spent so much money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara but doesn't make ur eye lashes look thick ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara but doesn't make ur eye lashes look thick and hard to take off. It definitely does its job though.
customer_reviews.author: Miki Horiai

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with the brush
customer_reviews.text: I use this alongside another mascara as I find the brush doesn't give me enough definition. A little disappointing especially considering the price;
customer_reviews.author: CEIR

customer_reviews.title: first I saw it recommended on Facebook for 19
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful, first I saw it recommended on Facebook for 19.99 through Amazon, then when I went to order it was 29.99 so I ordered it anyway but it's gloppy and not as expected. I don't think I would pay the price again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not good as waterproof mascara
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I want a true waterproof mascara. By the afternoon the mascara was flaking off and underneath my eyes. Will not purcahse again.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Grogan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a permanent type of mascara and this comes as close as I've seern yet. I can wear it for 3 days in a row, just touching up as needed. By the end of the third day I use make-up remover and start all over again. Thanks, Maureen, for a wonderful product! Just wish it was available in Brown.
customer_reviews.author: montana_gal

customer_reviews.title: No longer Cruelty free
customer_reviews.text: Loved Tarte--this is the greatest mascara ever. But they recently were bought out by KOSE-a NON-cruelty free company. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I love Tarte's Lights Camera Lashes so I thought I'd also love the waterproof version. Unfortunately, I do not. It does not give the length or fullness that I was expecting. I still use it and just put a layer of a volumizing mascara over it. I will not be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Lights , camera, lashes
customer_reviews.text: I like this mascara. With one exception. It sapsrates & cots your lashes nicely. I think great for day wear,but it doesn’t thicken or plump the lashes without multiple coats & who has time for that?! If you want thicker lashes, I’d suggest something more like Doll’s Eyes mascara. This mascara has more of a natural look. I honestly think the high price is rediculous!
customer_reviews.author: klsonsky

customer_reviews.title: This WAS my favorite mascara.
customer_reviews.text: I had received a trial version of this waterproof black Tarte mascara and LOVED LOVED LOVED it!! Finally thought I would splurge and get the full size. I'm not sure what happened between the time I received the trial sized and when I got the full sized one, but the full sized tube flaked miserably! I was very disappointed & won't be buying this again. Cute packaging, but what good is that when the product under-performs?!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost every day since I teach aqua fitness in the pool and this is waterproof yet natural.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcey Reina

customer_reviews.title: My FAV
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara! I usually use the smaller trial size tho bc I like the smaller brush. It coats the lashes better. I buy the big one and dip my smaller lash applicators into the full size. This mascara lengthens, thickens and is the most black in color I have found. Love it! Totally waterproof, so much so I have a hard time washing it off! But I'll take that rather then it running down my face giving me raccoon eyes!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzan D.

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Good mascara for waterproof but not as good as the regular version. Gets a little clumpy
customer_reviews.author: Barb49

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this mascara
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this mascara. i usually buy dime store mascara but got tired of it clumping and flaking off. i read online about this product and although it's a little spendy, it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa's mom

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I am picky. I have long lashes, but I use quite a bit of mascara like 3 coats. This goes on easy and isn't stiff or clumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Tcouch

customer_reviews.title: Love the mascara - HATE the brush
customer_reviews.text: I really like the waterproof functionality and the natural look to this mascara, but unless you scrape the brush against the opening of the tube to reduce the amount of mascara on the brush you will have a big mess on your hands. It smudges and clumps and gets all over your eyes unless you do this. I do not have this experience with any other mascara so I don't really understand it. Tarte, please make this with an improved brush. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: nicrav

customer_reviews.title: Mascara review
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this mascara and it cost less than at Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: ssan28655

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty average eyelashes and have tried every drug store mascara and quite a few higher-end mascarasas. This has been my favorite so far. Lush, full lashes without clumping, and it lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: Favourite Mascara!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favourite mascara for a long time. It perserveres with the best of them. Lasts all day, and when it says it's waterproof, it means it. It comes off with makeup remover of any kind, and makes them lashes look great!
customer_reviews.author: Rockett Novak

customer_reviews.title: Lengthens and holds curl of lashes
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it holds the curl in my lashes
customer_reviews.author: gold eyes

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this mascara a 4 because of the price. I really do love it, just wish it was a little more affordable. It goes on great for me, and finally a mascara that stays put and doesn't burn my eyes! I have allergies, so I really need a waterproof mascara, without a bunch of chemicals. No racoon eyes! It comes off like a breeze with jojoba oil. I have already bought another for a 'backup'
customer_reviews.author: aschmidy

customer_reviews.title: Just expected that my lashes were going to appear much ...
customer_reviews.text: Just expected that my lashes were going to appear much longer. I have average lashes-meaning that they are visible when I'm not wearing make-up.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Stitt

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good waterproof mascara that I could use while outside in the pool, well I shouldn't of bought this one. It runs all over the place. It also doesn't make your lashes look thick and full, I feel it weighs them down. For the price of this mascara I thought it would be a lot better than it is.
customer_reviews.author: mariss0711

customer_reviews.title: ... thick and hard to apply and does not look good. I really wanted to return it since it ...
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is thick and hard to apply and does not look good. I really wanted to return it since it cost so much. The shipping and receiving was fine but this is not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Tate

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I am completely obsessed with this mascara. The only reason I would not give this 5 stars is because it does take a little bit to dry so it's tacky for short while, but other than that, it is perfect! It is like I am wearing false lashes it makes mine so long and thick. LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danievib

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this when I first got it but I let it dry out just a bit I liked it much more... give it a chance .
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Very sensitive eyes and this mascara works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Allen S. Whitmer

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey
customer_reviews.text: It is surely water proof. My concern is it also smears under you lower eyelid. Not bad, but no difference from the less pricey mascara I was using before. I tried this product since I saw great reviews about it but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my mother and she loves it! Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The brush was super thin ...not what I expected like the non waterproof one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have small lashes and need to use waterproof because I live in a very humid tropical place. After trying Clinique, and MAC, which are very good, this Tarte mascara is one of a kind. My lashes look fuller, longer, and it really lasts all day. Only be careful when you apply it cause the product will smudge easily until it dries completely. Will keep on using this hope it doesnt ever get discontinued, top of tops 11/10.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ferro

customer_reviews.title: Love the mascara but the wand is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Love the mascara but the wand is terrible! I use one of my old -cleaned neutrogena wands and it works great. Comes off with coconut oil :)
customer_reviews.author: M Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does not dry very quickly and ends up on my upper eyelid.
customer_reviews.author: j syer

customer_reviews.title: I was worried the waterproof would not be as good as the original
customer_reviews.text: Tarte never disappoints. I was worried the waterproof would not be as good as the original. I have watery eyes so regular is usually a mess but I loved the original I got as a sample. The waterproof is equally as impressive and comes in an interesting package, as you would expect from Tarte. Tarte is one of the best cosmetic lines I have tried. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Liked this one
customer_reviews.text: I like this mascara and even after a couple of months it still goes on pretty well. Definitely lengthens lashes even more.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Keiser

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love Tarte Lights Camera Splashes mascara. I bought the water proof version for my wedding, and it didn't smudge despite crying :)
customer_reviews.author: jessica

product_meta.title: Tarte Lights, Camera, Splashes! Waterproof Mascara Black
product_meta.description: What it is:A waterproof lengthening, curling, volumizing, and conditioning mascara.What it does:Tarte Lights, Camera, Splashes! 4-In-1 Waterproof Mascara's waterproof formula gives you the bombshell lashes you love, and is guaranteed to stay put through rain, sweat or tears.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Synthetic Fragrances- Synthetic Dyes- Petro-Chemicals- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know:This mascara contains Skinvigorating(TM) ingredients such as beeswax, a natural waterproofing agent, mineral pigments, known for their soothing and softening properties, and carnauba wax, an emollient wax that ensures smooth application.
feature_bullets: FREE OF parabens mineral oil phthalates triclosan sodium lauryl sulfate gluten; Cruelty-Free
Holds lashes in place for all-day wear
Water-resistent formula keeps lashes looking great no matter what the day brings
No streaking, running, clumping or budging
Lengthens, curls and thickens your lashes

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
